Class RSA

extends java.lang.Object
    RSA Implementation.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      private java.math.BigInteger d
      Private encode exponent.
      private java.math.BigInteger e
      Public encode exponent.
      static java.math.BigInteger GENERATED_P
      Generated large prime number (p) using BigInteger.probablePrime(512, new Random()).
      static java.math.BigInteger GENERATED_Q
      Generated large prime number (q) using BigInteger.probablePrime(512, new Random()).
      private static int GROUP_BYTES_SIZE
      Bytes of the incoming text will be groupped in chunks of groupBytesSize.
      private java.math.BigInteger n
      The public and private key module.

      One: big integer, widely used.
      private static java.math.BigInteger TWO

      private static java.math.BigInteger ZERO
      Zero: big integer, widely used.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RSA()
      Default constructor using a generated key module and phi Euler function (Xavier Valls dixit).
      RSA(java.math.BigInteger p, java.math.BigInteger q)
      Constructs a new RSA assing two large prime numbers.

      Returns a list of BigInteger by groupping the source byte array into chunks of groupBySize.
      private java.util.List<java.math.BigInteger> parseByteArray(byte[] bytes)
      Returns a list of BigInteger by parsing the source byte array that contains chunks of groupBySize with a length byte preciding each chunk.
      private static java.math.BigInteger primeRelative(java.math.BigInteger phi)
      Returns the relative prime number, starting at 11 up to the argument.
      void setKeyModuleAndPhi(java.math.BigInteger p, java.math.BigInteger q)
      Sets the key module and the phi Euler function based on two large prime numbers.

    • Field Detail

      • GENERATED_P

        public static final java.math.BigInteger GENERATED_P
        Generated large prime number (p) using BigInteger.probablePrime(512, new Random()).

      • GENERATED_Q

        public static final java.math.BigInteger GENERATED_Q
        Generated large prime number (q) using BigInteger.probablePrime(512, new Random()).

      • ZERO

        private static final java.math.BigInteger ZERO
        Zero: big integer, widely used.

      • ONE

        private static final java.math.BigInteger ONE
        One: big integer, widely used.

      • TWO

        private static final java.math.BigInteger TWO
        Two: big integer, widely used.

      • GROUP_BYTES_SIZE

        private static final int GROUP_BYTES_SIZE
        Bytes of the incoming text will be groupped in chunks of groupBytesSize. Can not exceed 127.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        The public and private key module.

      • RSA

        Default constructor using a generated key module and phi Euler function (Xavier Valls dixit).

      • RSA

        public RSA(java.math.BigInteger p,
           java.math.BigInteger q)
        Constructs a new RSA assing two large prime numbers.
        Parameters:
        p - A large prime number.
        q - A large prime number.

    • Method Detail

      • primeRelative

        private static java.math.BigInteger primeRelative(java.math.BigInteger phi)
        Returns the relative prime number, starting at 11 up to the argument. Starting at less prime numbers can induce easily decriptable keys. The argument is the phi Euler funtion.
        Parameters:
        phi - The phi Euler funtion to find the relative prime.
        Returns:
        The relative prime.

      • calculate_d

        private static java.math.BigInteger calculate_d(java.math.BigInteger phi,
                                                java.math.BigInteger e)
        Calculates the private encode exponent given the phi Euler function and the public encode exponent.
        Parameters:
        phi - The phi Euler funtion.
        e - The public encode exponent.
        Returns:
        The private encode exponent.

      • encrypt

        private static java.math.BigInteger encrypt(java.math.BigInteger n,
                                            java.math.BigInteger e,
                                            java.math.BigInteger dec)
        Encrypts a decrypted value.
        Parameters:
        n - The key module.
        e - The public encode exponent.
        dec - The decrypted value to encrypt.
        Returns:
        The encrypted value.

      • decrypt

        private static java.math.BigInteger decrypt(java.math.BigInteger n,
                                            java.math.BigInteger d,
                                            java.math.BigInteger enc)
        Decrypts an encrypted value.
        Parameters:
        n - The key module.
        d - The private encode exponent.
        enc - The encrypted value to decrypt.
        Returns:
        The decrypted value.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The encripted string.

      • groupByteArray

        private java.util.List<java.math.BigInteger> groupByteArray(byte[] bytes)
        Returns a list of BigInteger by groupping the source byte array into chunks of groupBySize.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The source byte array
        Returns:
        The list of numbers.

      • decrypt

        public byte[] decrypt(byte[] encryptedBytes)
        Decrypts an array of bytes.
        Parameters:
        encryptedBytes - The encrypted array to decrypt.
        Returns:
        The decrypted array of bytes.

      • parseByteArray

        private java.util.List<java.math.BigInteger> parseByteArray(byte[] bytes)
        Returns a list of BigInteger by parsing the source byte array that contains chunks of groupBySize with a length byte preciding each chunk.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The source byte array
        Returns:
        The list of numbers.
